general.gigTitle: do website development as full stack web developer, PHP laravel HTML CSS react

sellerCard.oneLiner: Android, iOS Mobile App, Flutter Developer
sellerCard.description: Hey! I'm Mahmodul, leading an expert developer team. We have worked on projects ranging from the basic to the expert level. We're dedicated to crafting seamless, user-centric experiences. From cutting-edge website development to innovative mobile solutions using Flutter framework, we blend expertise with innovation. We're always open to discussing potential projects or collaborations. Your ideas and requirements are important to us, and we look forward to exploring how we can work together to bring them to life.

description.content:
Are you searching for a highly experienced full-stack web developer?


Great! You have come to the right place.


I am a highly motivated and experienced Full Stack Developer passionate about creating innovative and user-friendly website design and development that can compete in the market and give you an edge. My expertise lies in developing and maintaining web applications using various tech stacks.


Frontend: HTML/CSS/SASS, JavaScript, Typescript, React, Vuejs

Styling Frameworks: Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, Styled Components, and custom CSS or SCSS

Backend: PHP, PHP Laravel, Node.js, API integrations, Django, API development

Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL


Services You Will Get.


  • Build or Rebuild Complete Functional Website
  • Custom Website Development
  • Fully Responsive for All Devices
  • Design or Redesign Frontend
  • Backend Development
  • Figma to Website Conversion
  • Rest API Creation
  • API Integration
  • SEO Optimization


My promises are:


- Good Quality Work

- Problem-solving

- Good Communication

- On-going Support


To create a website, we need to make it look and work in a way that represents your brand. So, when you see "Contact Me," you can click on it to start the process.

slide.name: do website development as full stack web developer, PHP laravel HTML CSS react

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to provide for the Figma to Website conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Simply share your Figma design files and any specific requirements. I'll take care of the rest!

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I request revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We provide a set number of revisions based on your package. You can request changes through the platform's messaging system.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you assist with website maintenance after development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Absolutely! I offer ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your website continues to perform at its best.

packageList.title: Figma to Website Conversion
packageList.description: Small scale 1 page Figma to Website. Recommended for Landing Page or Dashboard

packageList.title: Custom Website Development
packageList.description: Medium scale Up to 5 pages, Best for basic websites, Admin + User Portal

packageList.title: Large Scale Website, Full Stack Web
packageList.description: Large-scale website Up to 10 pages for startup business. and API integration, 3 Portals. For custom

openGraph.title: do website development as full stack web developer, PHP laravel HTML CSS react

reviews.comment: Mahmodul was a pleasure to work with. Him and his team are thorough, very communicative, professional, and everything else you could ask. I don’t know much about developing websites but I feel as if I took a course, as now I know the language, process, etc as they kept me within the loop the whole time. I am very pleased with my website and will be working with Mahmodul again in the near future !!

seller_response.comment: Always a pleasure to work with someone so professional and organized.

reviews.comment: They're probably better at much smaller projects that don't require that much attention to detail and feature richness so don't be put off by my review. Just stay away if your project is large and complex.

Cooperating with Md. is very good. His team is professional. They are quick, the answer right away and overall is nice. They have worked on a very difficult project that requires expertise and understanding and they got it both. Under my guide they have show professionalism so I will use them in the future.

seller_response.comment: I truly appreciate your confidence in my work. Looking forward to collaborating again in the future.

reviews.comment: Initially, they did a decent job delivering the project, but there were some revisions needed because it didn’t fully match the design file. I provided detailed instructions and even included screenshots to guide them, but they still struggled to implement the changes correctly. Toward the end, they tried to pressure me into accepting the project delivery, citing concerns about their rating, even though the work wasn’t completed as expected. Ultimately, they couldn’t finalize it to my standards, and I had to step in and finish it myself.
Great work and they understood what I wanted I changed some things and they were happy to facilitate the changes the team are very knowledgeable of web development

seller_response.comment: I truly appreciate your confidence in my work. Looking forward to collaborating again in the future.
